string.text: Have you ever heard about Chief? He is a high-rank bandit who has lead many notorious missions before. It is strange that I haven't heard any news about his operation recently. He is recruiting people at Bandit Stronghold in Dark Valley, which I think you can take advantage of.
They said there is a man who is hiring people at Bandit Stronghold in Dark Valley.
I need to prepare my stuff for the robbery. Talk to Chief when I'm ready.
I need to follow Chief to help him rob the Ecologists.
The robbery was successful. Talk to Chief to earn my reward.
